game.name: Yorin Love (With Me)
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Yorin Love (With Me) is a dating deck-builder set in the fantasy city of Venturia. Play as Yorin Love, a bachelor who loves love, as he desperately tries to make it back home still single. Engage in a unique reverse-visual novel where the dates choose from a dialogue tree you build!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Yorin Love (With Me) is a dating deck-builder set in the fantasy city of Venturia. Play as Yorin Love, a bachelor who loves love, as he desperately tries to make it back home still single. Engage in a unique reverse-visual novel where the dates choose from a dialogue tree you build!
